name: Fun in the Sun 3D!
description:
Just a little playground, being designed with very little prior planning. A free design process, yes... very freeing...

Can you reach the hidden worlds??? Turn the audio up for best experience...

  • Player 1 Controls: WASD+Space
  • Player 2 Controls: Arrow Keys+P OR NumPad [THIS ISN'T WORKING ATM I WILL FIX THIS WHEN I GET HOME FROM WORK I SWEAR D:]
